result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Felix M Noguear

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Felix M Noguear in court.  Attorney Ruby De Leon in court for Felix M Noguear.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Jury Trial.  Parties are ready to proceed with jury trial  Case passed to address rest of Court's calendar.

Second call.  Defense counsel requests adjournment due to additional discovery.  Court will grant request.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Felix M Noguear appeared by video.  Attorney Ruby De Leon appeared by video for Felix M Noguear.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Final Pretrial held.  Parties advise Court they remain in trial posture and no further pretrial motions remain.  Case remains calendared for Jury Trial on 9/28/2022 at 9:00 am, Courthouse Room 501.
Received and Filed. State's Motion in Limine
Received and Filed. State's Witness List
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions, received and filed.
Defendant's Motions in Limine, received and filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Felix M Noguear in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date. All final pretrial documents and motions to be filed within 7 days of final pretrial. Case adjourned.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Felix M Noguear in court with attorney Ruby De Leon.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense counsel has not received discovery and an offer from the state.  Defense requests status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Hope R.; 
Jose R.

Defendant Felix M Noguear in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Felix M Noguear in custody.  Mallory R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Felix M Noguear appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
